page.title: 02Legends of Dunston & Nocton
page.content: In Dunston there is a manor house which has a ghost.The ghost is a baby that cries every Tuesday night.It cries from the first floor landing.The poodle Mr Sooty has also started barking from time to time.Mr Higginbottom said"I have felt there was someone or something there on occasions but I have never seen anyone.I believe a servant had a baby girl that died very young." In Dunston there is also a headless horseman that rides around the church.People have heard horses hooves during the night.I dont think anyone has ever seen it. The grey lady of Nocton is a woman who was the first person who died in Nocton Hospital.She goes around the grounds of Nocton Hospital at night.I do not think anyone has seen it.
